data.title: Tammy Jo Driver 1961-2024

data.text:
Tammy Jo Driver passed away on Monday, January 22, 2024. She was 62 years old.

Tammy was born November 19, 1961, and raised in Utica, Mississippi. She graduated from Hinds Community College. She owned and operated Tammy’s Lawn Care. She is preceded in death by her parents Leonard and Josephine Graham, sisters Sandra Lee Bass and Joyce Rebecca Graham, brother Roy Leonard Graham and a grandson, Thomas William Bahan.

She is survived by her husband Donald Driver, son Cameron Driver, daughters Amanda Fisher, April Baham Westbrook, and Amy Baham, brother Richard Graham, sisters Cynthia Jones and Jimmie Lynn Turnage, grandchildren Cody Baham, Lexis Dearman (Braedon), Gavin Fisher, Austin Carter, Zackary Carter, Brayden Fisher, David Thompkins, and Casey Westbrook, great-grandchildren Roman Dearman, Naomi Dearman, and Atlas Dearman.

Funeral services will be Saturday, January 27, 2024, at Glenwood Funeral Home in Utica, MS at 2:00 p.m. with Rev. Brad Hartzog officiating. Visitation will be 12:00 p.m. till the hour of the service.
